src:
Luhut: Gojek Punya Kapasitas Besar dan Terus Berkembang
02 Nov 2019, 10:41 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator (Menko) Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi, Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan mengungkapkan bahwa Gojek Indonesia akan terus berkembang.Hal itu diungkapkannya pada saat menjadi pembicara kunci di acara Ultah Gojek Indonesia ke-9 di parkir selatan komplek GBK, Jakarta Selatan."Gojek sekarang perusahaan yang baik. Punya kapasitas besar dan sedang terus berkembang," ungkap Luhut, Sabtu (3/11/2019).Luhut berpesan kepada para mitra untuk terus disiplin sebagai bagian dari cara mendukung perkembangan Gojek dimaksud. Sebab, perkembangan Gojek akan berdampak pada tingkat kesejahteraan seluruh mitra."Kalau berkembang, mitra akan semakin sejahtera," jelas dia.Lebih lanjut, Luhut mengatakan Pemerintah terus mendukung tumbuh kembang dan keberlangsungan Gojek sebagai bagian dari kebanggaan Indonesia. Maka, menurutnya, pemerintah akan tetap mendukung Gojek karena salah satunya menjadi solusi bagi masyarakat kecil."Gojek ini perusahaan Indonesia, berkembang di Indonesia, dan harus terus jadi tuan rumah di Negara sendiri. Maju Gojek! Maju Indonesia!," tegas Luhut.Sejauh perjalanan 9 tahun, Gojek berkembang menjadi platform penyedia multi-layanan on-demand berbasis aplikasi terdepan di Asia Tenggara. Beroperasi di 207 kota di Asia Tenggara dan 5 negara di Asia Tenggara.Aplikasi mobile (mobile App) kali pertama Gojek diluncurkan pada 2015. Berevolusi dari layanan transportasi menjadi ekosistem dengan tiga super app. Super App Pelanggan, Super App Pengemudi, dan Super App Merchant."Gojek adalah pelopor konsep Super App yang telah membuktikan kesuksesan model ekosistem bisnis yang menghubungkan jutaan orang, pelanggan, mitra driver, merchant, serta penyedia layanan," ucap Co-CEO Gojek, Kevin Aluwi.Ke depan, Gojek akan terus membangun bisnis dengan pertumbuhan yang kuat dan berkelanjutan melalui pendekatan berbasis produk."Artinya, brand Gojek lekat di masyarakat utamanya karena Gojek menyediakan produk yang mudah digunakan dan benar-benar menjadi solusi untuk menyelesaikan permasalahan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari pelanggan kami," Co-CEO Gojek, Andre Soelistyo, menambahkan.Simak Video "Komentari Penusukan Wiranto, Luhut Pandjaitan: Jangan Dibesar-Besarkan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/eds)
text:
Luhut: Gojek Has a Large Capacity and Continues to Grow
02 Nov 2019, 10:41 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - The Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment, Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan, revealed that Gojek Indonesia will continue to develop. now a good company. Has a large capacity and is growing, "said Luhut, Saturday (11/03/2019). Luhut advised the partners to continue to be disciplined as part of how to support the development of the Gojek. Because, the development of Gojek will have an impact on the level of welfare of all partners. "If it develops, partners will be more prosperous," he explained. Furthermore, Luhut said the Government continued to support the growth and development of Gojek as part of Indonesia's pride. So, according to him, the government will continue to support Gojek because one of them is a solution for the small community. "Gojek is an Indonesian company, developing in Indonesia, and must continue to host its own country. Go Goo! Goo! Go forward! Indonesia," said Luhut. over a 9-year journey, Gojek has evolved to become the leading application-based multi-service on-demand platform in Southeast Asia. Operating in 207 cities in Southeast Asia and 5 countries in Southeast Asia. The first mobile application (Gojek) was launched in 2015. Revolutionizing transportation services into an ecosystem with three super apps. "Super App Customers, Super App Drivers, and Super App Merchants." Gojek is a pioneer of the Super App concept that has proven the success of a business ecosystem model that connects millions of people, customers, partner drivers, merchants, and service providers, "said Gojek's Co-CEO, Kevin Aluwi. Going forward, Gojek will continue to build a business with strong and sustainable growth through a product-based approach. "That is, the Gojek brand is closely related to the community because Gojek provides products that are easy to use and truly become solutions to solving problems in daily life. of our customers, "Gojek's Co-CEO, Andre Soelistyo, added. Watch Video" Wiranto's Stabbing Commentary, Luhut Pandjaitan: Don't Be Exaggerated "[Gambas: Video 20seconds] (hek / eds)
